contentrichtext.text: ==Rationale== {{Non-free use rationale album cover| Article = Jagged Little Pill | Use = Infobox <!-- ADDITIONAL INFORMATION --> | Name = ''[[Jagged Little Pill]]'' | Artist = [[Alanis Morissette]] | Label = [[Maverick Records]]/[[Reprise Records]] | Type = [[studio album]] <!--OVERRIDE FIELDS --> | Portion = Whole portion of front cover used. }} ==Licensing== {{Non-free album cover|image has rationale=yes}} {{reviewedfairuse|date=02:56, 27 February 2008 (UTC)|user=[[User:Kaiba|Kaiba]]|pages=[[Jagged Little Pill]]}} [[Category:Images of Alanis Morissette]] [[Category:Alanis Morissette album covers]]
